plot: Duncan and Gunda are constructing a weapon powerful enough to kill humanity instantly. At the most crucial moment Gunda's doubts challenge their shared ideals, thus prompting a battle between good and evil, life and total annihilation.
title: The Dark Side of the Mind
plot_es: Duncan and Gunda are constructing a weapon powerful enough to kill humanity instantly. At the most crucial moment Gunda's doubts challenge their shared ideals, thus prompting a battle between good and evil, life and total annihilation.
